qas.question: Which movie was released twice on Squeeze LD?
What improvement was added to Terminator 2's second Squeeze LD release?
What Warner Brothers films were available in 16:9 aspect ratio Squeeze LDs?

answers.text: Unforgiven, Grumpy Old Men, The Fugitive, and Free Willy

qas.question: What films were available for Japanese market Squeeze LDs?

answers.text: Basic Instinct, Stargate, Terminator 2: Judgment Day, Showgirls, Cutthroat Island, and Cliffhanger

context: There were no anamorphic LaserDisc titles available in the US except for promotional purposes. Upon purchase of a Toshiba 16:9 television viewers had the option of selecting a number of Warner Bros. 16:9 films. Titles include <a2_0>Unforgiven, Grumpy Old Men, The Fugitive, and Free Willy<a2_0/>. The Japanese lineup of titles was different. A series of releases under the banner "SQUEEZE LD" from Pioneer of mostly Carolco titles included <a3_0>Basic Instinct, Stargate, Terminator 2: Judgment Day, Showgirls, Cutthroat Island, and Cliffhanger<a3_0/>. <a0_0>Terminator 2<a0_0/> was released twice in Squeeze LD, the second release being <a1_0>THX certified<a1_0/> and a notable improvement over the first.
